mapper.sql: quality_task_detail_id AS "qualityTaskDetailId", sku_id AS "skuId", quality_plan_id AS "qualityPlanId",number AS "number",brand_id AS "brandId", create_user AS "createUser", update_user AS "updateUser", create_time AS "createTime", update_time AS "updateTime", display AS "display", deptId AS "deptId"
mapper.select:
select
from daoxin_erp_quality_task_detail where 1 = 1 and display = 1
and quality_task_detail_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.qualityTaskDetailId},'%')
and sku_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.skuId},'%')
and quality_task_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.qualityTaskId},'%')
and create_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createUser},'%')
and update_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateUser},'%')
and create_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createTime},'%')
and update_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateTime},'%')
and display like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.display},'%')
and deptId like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.deptId},'%')
